Article Title: Meet the Indian world champion who memorised 80 numbers in 13.5 seconds
Article Text:
How do you prepare for the Memory League World Championship?

What does your memory palace look like?

How much can these rooms hold?

Can you describe one of the challenges in Memory League World Championship?

Do you realise how amazing this is?

What's next?

In early Feb, Vishvaa Rajakumar , a 20-year-old Indian college student, won the Memory League World Championship , an online competition pitting people against one another with challenges like memorising the order of 80 random numbers faster than most people can tie a shoelace.Renowned neuroscientist Eleanor Maguire, who died in Jan, studied mental athletes like Rajakumar and found that many of them used the ancient Roman "method of loci," a memorisation trick also known as the " memory palace ."The technique takes several forms, but it generally involves visualising a large house and assigning memories to rooms. Mentally walking through the house fires up the hippocampus, the seahorse-shaped engine of memory deep in the brain that consumed Maguire's career.NYT asked Rajakumar about his strategies of memorisation. His answers:Hydration is very important because it helps your brain. When you memorise things, you usually sub-vocalise, and it helps to have a clear throat. Let's say you're reading a book. You're not reading it out loud, but you are vocalising within yourself. If you don't drink a lot of water, your speed will be a bit low. If you drink a lot of water, it will be more and more clear and you can read it faster.Let's say my first location is my room where I sleep. My second location is the kitchen. And the third location is my hall. The fourth location is my veranda. Another location is my bathroom. Let's say I am memorising a list of words. Let's say 10 words. What I do is, I take a pair of words, make a story out of them and place them in a location. And I take the next two words. I make a story out of them. I place them in the second location. The memory palace will help you to remember the sequence.A lot. Let's say I'm memorising 100 words. I'm making a story out of every two words. There will be a set of 50 stories. But I can't remember which one came first or which one came second. That would be a problem, right? So if I use the memory palace, I can remember which came first and which came second. So likewise, I can remember all of the 50 stories.They give you 80 random numbers that they display on a screen. You have to memorise all of those numbers as fast as possible, then click a button and a recall sheet appears. I wrote down all of the 80 digits - and I got them all right. My fastest time to memorise 80 random digits in World Championship was 13.5 seconds, so almost six digits per second.Yes, I do. I was crying.After completion of college, like in two to three months, I'll probably try to be a memory trainer and create a memory institution in India to teach other people these techniques. My goal is to make it big. NYT
Article Summary: Vishvaa rajakumar, 20, won the memory league world championship. He used the ancient roman " method of loci," a memorisation trick also known as the " memory palace" the technique takes several forms, but it generally involves visualising a large house and assigning memories to rooms.

Article Title: Anthony Edwards firmly rejects Michael Jordan comparisons: “I just wish y’all would stop comparing me to him”
Article Text:
Anthony Edwards. Image via: David Berding/Getty Images

Anthony Edwards straightway dismissed fans' comparison of him with Michael Jordan



Michael Jordan. Image via: Aurelien Meunier/ Getty Images

Anthony Edwards’ confident exchange with Barack Obama during Team USA event made headlines



Minnesota Timberwolves star Anthony Edwards has made a name for himself as one of the most promising young players in the NBA. The way the rising standout star has been playing his game led many to draw comparisons between Edwards and the legendary Michael Jordan . However, the 23-year-old guard has made it clear that he is not interested in being measured against the greatest player of all time.During All-Star Weekend, Anthony Edwards was asked about adding any of Michael Jordan ’s signature moves into his own game. Ant-Man did not hesitate to refute the comparison. “No moves, man. Shout out to MJ, he the GOAT. I just wish y’all would stop comparing me to him,” he said. Of course, Edwards appreciates the respect that comes with the comparison, but he seems to feel that it adds unnecessary pressure.Edwards has consistently shown that he wants to be recognized for his own unique style of play rather than living in the shadow of NBA legends.This isn’t the first time Edwards has downplayed his place in the sport. Despite being widely regarded as one of the NBA’s next big superstars, he doesn’t see himself as the future face of the league. When recently asked if he envisions himself as the league’s next top player, especially with legends like LeBron James, Kevin Durant, and Stephen Curry nearing the end of their careers, his response was refreshingly candid, “No, not really.” Instead, Edwards pointed to San Antonio Spurs rookie sensation Victor Wembanyama, saying, “That’s what they got Wemby for.”He elaborated further in an interview with TNT, “I’m capable of being that guy. But I don’t want to be that guy, I’ll put it like that. I want to be the guy that just show up and hoop and just kill dudes and go home.”Edwards' confidence isn’t just limited to his performances on the court. Recently, he made headlines for his bold exchange with former U.S. President Barack Obama during Netflix’s Court of Gold docuseries, which provided a behind-the-scenes look at Team USA’s preparations for the Paris Olympics.In one interesting moment, Obama jokingly asked Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid about Edwards, saying, “What do you think about this young guy? He can hoop a little bit, huh?” Embiid, with a smile, responded, “Just a little bit.” But Edwards, never one to back down, immediately responded with his usual candid manner, “Nah, y’all better stand down. I’m the truth.”Also Read: Jimmy Butler addresses beef with Miami Heat after blockbuster trade to Golden State Warriors: “It didn’t end the way everybody hoped” The 23-year-old Minnesota Timberwolves star player has been one of the best in the league with astonishing stats already added to his name. He is currently averaging 27.5 points per game, 5.8 rebounds, and 4.8 assists.
Article Summary: Minnesota timberwolves star anthony edwards has made a name for himself as one of the most promising young players in the nba. The way the rising standout star has been playing his game led many to draw comparisons between edwards and the legendary michael jordan.

Article Title: Is Ric Flair and Charlotte Flair's Personal Life Always Been Controversial? Exploring the Married Life Details of the Father-Daughter Duo
Article Text:
(Charlotte Flair and Ric Flair. Image Via Joachim Sielski/Getty Images)

Charlotte Flair's personal life and marriage with Andrade El Idolo

Charlotte Flair's failed marriage with Thomas Latimer and Riki Johnson

Ric Flair’s controversial marriage and love life

Charlotte Flair recalls Ric’s Retirement Match: Charlotte Flair A&E Biography: Legends sneak peek

Charlotte Flair is considered a key figure in WWE. She is known as The Queen of WWE who has been reigning the ring since 2013. Flair is known as a wrestling royalty, as she has become one of the marquee WWE names, surpassing the legacy of her father, Ric Flair , in the industry.Born to wrestling legend Ric Flair, aka “The Nature Boy,” and Elizabeth Flair, and growing up in a wrestling-centric family, she was exposed to the sport from an early age. Needless to say, Charlotte Flair has truly upheld the legacy of her family within the sport.However, Charlotte Flair and Ric Flair’s personal lives have been much different than their professional lives. The wrestling champion had to face tremendous hardships when it came to her personal life, marriage, and relationships.Let’s take a look at the personal controversies that the father-daughter duo were involved in:WWE superstar Charlotte Flair came into prominence again and won millions of WWE fans' hearts as she went on to clinch the WWE Royal Rumble match in 2025, securing a spot at Wrestlemania 41 .After a year-long hiatus due to a knee injury, Charlotte made a triumphant return to WWE, showcasing her skills and dedication to wrestling.No sooner did the news of her entry into WrestleMania 41 was announced, fans were left in shock after Charlotte Flair confirmed divorce from her husband Andrade El Idolo after two years of marriage.The WWE stars ended their marriage in July 2024, with court records confirming that the divorce was finalized in October 2024. According to records, Charlotte Flair filed for divorce in Florida back in June 2024. However, a judge signed off on the split in October, making it official to her fans.As per TMZ’s report , there are no official court records found mentioning the cause of Andrade and Flair's separation . However, there are speculations that adultery may have played a role in the sudden break, even though the official cause is still unknown.Looking back on their relationship, the couple announced their relationship in 2019, leading to their engagement in 2020 and marriage in 2022. The wrestling duo tied the knot in a grand wedding in Mexico, in the presence of their loved ones and some wrestling legends.Before her marriage with Andrade, Charlotte was involved with Thomas Latimer. The former wrestling couple got married in 2013, but two years after their marriage, the couple drifted apart in 2015.Moreover, Flair’s ex-husband was also arrested on the charge of felony counts of domestic battery by strangulation and false imprisonment, which could be a reason for their divorce.Besides Thomas Latimer, Charlotte Flair was also in a marriage for a very short time with Riki Paul Johnson. Riki Paul Johnson was Charlotte’s first husband. The former couple tied the knot in 2010 and eventually got controversially divorced in 2013.The WWE Queen in her autobiography “Second Nature,” claimed that she had been a victim of domestic assault at the hands of Riki Paul Johnson, citing the reason for their failed marriage. However, Johnson dismissed the claims later made by the WWE Women's Champion. Wrestling icon Ric Flair 's journey through love and relationships has been filled with passion, challenges, and lessons. With five marriages and multiple relationships, his story reflects the ups and downs of his relationship.Flair's most recent marriage was with Wendy Barlow, his fifth wife. They were together for 13 years, including six years as a married couple. On September 23, 2024, Flair announced his separation from Barlow.Ric Flair's first marriage was to Leslie Goodman, with whom he had two children, Megan and David. The former couple were together from 1971 to 1983.In 1983, Flair married Elizabeth Harrell, with whom he had two children Charlotte Flair and Reid Flair. Charlotte walked into his shoes and became one of the significant figures in the WWE universe.Also Read: Charlotte Flair’s Relationship History: Exploring Past Marriages of the Former Multi-Time WWE Women’s Champion As for his current relationship, Ric Flair is not currently dating anyone. The wrestling legend is focusing on both personal and professional life. Meanwhile, Charlotte Flair is focusing on her success after winning the Women's Royal Rumble 2025 and now aiming to win her next title at the WrestleMania 41.
Article Summary: Charlotte flair and ric flair's personal lives have been much different than their professional lives. The wrestling champion had to face tremendous hardships when it came to her personal life, marriage, and relationships. Flair is known as a wrestling royalty, as she has become one of the marquee wwe names, surpassing her father's legacy.

Article Title: Taylor Swift has "fresh evidence" against her in Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni drama that is raising new questions days after Super Bowl 2025
Article Text:
Image via Luke Johnson/The Seattle Times

Taylor Swift Gets Dragged Into The Blake Lively - Justin Baldoni Drama Due To Fresh Evidence Hinting At Her Involvement



Isabela Ferrer REVEALS Taylor Swift Helped Her Get ‘It Ends with Us’ Role (Exclusive)

Fans Have Reacted Pretty Strongly As Many Slam Blake Lively For The Whole Drama



Taylor Swift, the billionaire pop star, has been in the news ever since she got booed at the Super Bowl 2025 while her boyfriend, Travis Kelce led Kansas City Chiefs lost the trophy to the Philadelphia Eagles. Away from the Super Bowl drama, Taylor Swift has also gotten herself involved in the legal drama between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni, even though she has not been sued. But now it seems like there is some fresh drama regarding it.Famous social media influencer Melanie King recently uploaded a video on X with some fresh evidence that Taylor Swift was indeed “involved” in the making of Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni’s hit movie It Ends With Us. The video has Justin Baldoni talking to an interviewer about the casting for Isabella Ferrer who played the role of young Blake in the blockbuster movie.As Justin Baldoni discusses about finding the perfect person for the role, the interviewer says, “You told me Taylor Swift helped her get the role? Like signed off on audition?”To this, Justin Baldoni says, “I was casting and I had actually brought in and showed her casting tape to Blake and Taylor. They were both like “Yes her!” and that’s a true story”. The interviewer then asked Justin Baldoni how he had convinced Taylor Swift to lend her song for their movie and Justin Baldoni says, “I had nothing to do with it. I mean this is all Blake”.Justin Baldoni continued, “Like I said, Blake was involved in all aspects of this production and she is also a marketing genius”.Melanie King’s caption for the video reads as, “Taylor Swift caught in a HUGE lie. She said she had no part in the casting of this actress for It Ends With Us. Ma’am Justin Baldoni has the receipts. Bless his heart. He was trying to be positive while they were destroying his entire life behind the scenes.”The social media influencer, Melanie King, also went on to add that even though Taylor Swift did not officially cast Isabella Ferrer in the movie, it was her choice that was taken into consider by the production company.Fans have reacted strongly to this. A fan commented, “I don't know that Taylor is lying. She may have just been having conversations with her friend, who then used that to get her way. I'm not saying it didn't happen, but I lean towards Blake twisting things to use the power of Taylor's name”.Another fan wrote, “I suspect Blake has been overstating how involved Taylor actually is.”Taylor Swift has not issued a statement about the whole drama between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni and has remained silent. Blake Lively was recently spotted on the SNL red carpet with her husband Ryan Reynolds. Taylor Swift skipped her friend's birthday party in New York City and has maintained a low profile.Travis Kelce have also not been spotted in public after Super Bowl.Also Read: Bill Belichick and 24-year-old girlfriend Jordon Hudson discuss prenup as their relationship takes a serious turn
Article Summary: Isabela ferrer reveals taylor swift helped her get ‘it ends with us’ role (exclusive)fans have reacted pretty strongly as many slam blake lively for the whole drama. Taylor swift skipped her friend's birthday party in new york city and has maintained a low profile.

Article Title: Lonzo, LiAngelo and LaMelo Ball’s father LaVar Ball faces major health battle, undergoes foot amputation
Article Text:
LaVar Bal. Image via: Brad Penner-Imagn Images

Lonzo, LaMelo, and LiAngelo Ball

LaVar Ball

LaVar Ball amputated his right foot after serious health crisis



Lonzo Ball, LaMelo Ball, LiAngelo Ball and LaVar Ball. Image via: Joshua Blanchard / Getty Images

The outspoken and charismatic father of basketball stars, recently had his right foot amputated following a serious medical issue. The news, first reported by TMZ Sports on Wednesday, has yet to be publicly addressed by LaVar or his sons. However, despite the health issue, sources confirm that the 57-year-old remains in great spirits. LaVar Ball has long been a popular figure in the sports world who made his name known for his larger-than-life personality and relentless promotion of his sons. He co-founded the Big Baller Brand, which gained attention for launching signature shoes for the Ball brothers and making headlines with its ambitious $3 billion price tag for a deal with major sneaker companies. However, his recent health battle has brought a different kind of attention to the Ball family.According to TMZ Sports, LaVar underwent the amputation procedure on Wednesday afternoon. Though details surrounding the medical issue remain undisclosed, reports indicate that the father of basketball stars and musician Lonzo, LiAngelo, and LaMelo Ball , is handling the situation quite well. A recently surfaced photo of LaVar smiling post-surgery showed his positive attitude as he fought back despite the life-altering event.So far, none of the Ball brothers have publicly addressed their father’s surgery. LaMelo Ball is currently playing for the Charlotte Hornets, while Lonzo Ball , who plays for the Chicago Bulls, has been dealing with his own injury struggles. LiAngelo Ball, though never making an NBA roster, has been pursuing a career in music.Given LaVar’s history of fiercely supporting his sons, fans have no doubt that his family is rallying around him during this time. While he has kept a lower profile in recent years, LaVar remains a strong presence in their lives.Before becoming a household name in the basketball world, LaVar Ball had his own journey as an athlete. He played college basketball at Cal State-Los Angeles and had brief stints with the New York Jets and Carolina Panthers during his attempt at a professional football career.Though he has drawn criticism for his bold proclamations— such as claiming he could beat Michael Jordan one-on-one— LaVar has also been praised for his dedication to his sons’ success. He created the Big Baller Brand, which sought to disrupt the sneaker industry by giving young athletes an alternative to mainstream endorsement deals.Also Read: NBA Drama Unfolds: LiAngelo Ball's Ex-Girlfriend Nikki Mudarris Exchanges Jabs With His New Baby Mama After Cheating Allegation: "You can keep him" Fans are waiting for comments from the Ball family detailing LaVar’s health crisis and what led to the amputation of his right foot. However, details surrounding the incident are yet to be revealed. Regardless, it appears that he is now out of any danger and dealing with his recovery.LaMelo Ball took the court against the Los Angeles Lakers just hours after news about his father made headlines. He delivered a strong performance, scoring 27 points on 9-of-19 shooting. His effort helped the Charlotte Hornets secure a hard-fought 100-97 victory against the Los Angeles Lakers at Crypto.com Arena.
Article Summary: Lavar ball, father of basketball stars lonzo, liangelo, and lamelo, recently had his right foot amputated following a serious medical issue. The news has yet to be publicly addressed by lavar or his sons. Despite the health issue, sources confirm that the 57-year-old remains in great spirits.

Article Title: Joe Burrow spotted with a woman who was previously seen with CeeDee Lamb sparking bizarre speculation among fans
Article Text:
Image via Cooper Neill/Getty

Joe Burrow Was Recently Spotted With A Woman Who Was Also Spotted With Ceedee Lamb And Fans Have Questions About It



Joe Burrow Has Kept His Dating Life Pretty Private After He Broke Up With His Ex Girlfriend



Joe Burrow , the quarterback of the Cincinnati Bengals , has a huge fan base among women and many are curious about his personal life, which he mostly likes to keep private. Recently, a picture of him with a woman has gone viral, raising eyebrows. While fans are curious about the woman, but now there is a bizarre speculation going on and it includes CeeDee lambs.Recently, a picture of Joe Burrow has gone viral with Thursday Night Football’s feature reporter Taylor Rooks. The picture is undated and shows the two laughing as they sat next to each other at a high end restaurant. While fans are curious about the nature of their relationship, there is a bizarre speculation going around that Taylor Rooks was “previously with” Ceedee Lambs.A fan took to X and wrote, “Wasn’t she just with CeeDee Lamb?”, while another fan wrote, “Wasnt she just with CeeDee lamb last week??”A third fan wrote, “CeeDee punching air rn”. The reason for this speculation is, just a day before the Super Bowl, Taylor Rooks was spotted with Ceedee Lambs at a party in New Orleans.In the pictures that have gone viral, Ceedee Lamb is dressed in a white graphic T-shirt as he wrapped his arm around Taylor Rooks. Taylor Rooks looked stunning as she wore a black strapless dress and big golden hoops. She kept her short hair open and opted for minimal makeup to complete her look for the night.When the picture of Taylor Rooks with Ceedee Lamb had gone viral, fans were losing their minds over how beautiful they looked together. A fan wrote, “Now that is a beautiful couple!”, while another fan wrote, “If this his gf lamb is winning she’s beautiful let’s go Lamb!”Currently, there is no confirmation if Taylor Rooks is dating either of the NFL players or is just friends with both of them but fans have made up their own stories.As for Joe Burrow, he remains officially single as he has not confirmed any relationship rumours after his relationship with ex girlfriend Olivia Holzmacher ended in 2023. Olivia Holzmacher and Joe Burrow met in college back in 2017 and remained together for a couple of years.She was also spotted cheering on for Joe Burrow many times and there were also rumours about an engagement. As luck would have it, things did not work out between the two and they broke up.Later, Joe Burrow was rumoured to be dating famous Olivia Ponton but the two have not confirmed their relationship yet. Many people have continued to troll Olivia Ponton and tease the two but they have remained tight lipped.Joe Burrow and Olivia Ponton continue to follow each other on social media despite not openeing up to the media.Also Read: Taylor Swift has "fresh evidence" against her in Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni drama that is raising new questions
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals quarterback joe burrow was recently spotted with a woman. The woman was also spotted with ceedee lambs. Fans are speculating that taylor rooks was previously with lamb. There is no confirmation if she is dating either of the nfl players.

Article Title: Chicago Bears expected to offer Kansas City Chiefs’ Trey Smith a record $105 million contract
Article Text:
(Image via Imagn Images)

Kansas City Chiefs cannot match the Chicago Bears’ offer, and Trey Smith is set to hit the open market

The Athletic’s

“The Chiefs are not expected to place the franchise tag or the transition tag on Smith, according to a league source.”

Trey Smith and Darnell Wright played together at Tennessee, and the Bears could reunite them in 2025

Bleacher Report

“If Smith does end up in the Windy City, he’ll be reunited with stalwart right tackle Darnell Wright. Smith played next to Wright for two years at Tennessee, and the two could jump-start a flailing Bears offensive line together in 2025.”

If the Chicago Bears sign Trey Smith, the offensive guard market will shift dramatically

“Smith is a powerful mover in the run game, as his run block win rate of 75.1% ranked sixth among guards. Plus, he has the foot speed to mirror interior defenders and the strength at 6-6 and 321 pounds to anchor against bull rushes. Bears general manager Ryan Poles could make a splash move to rebuild the front for Ben Johnson’s new offense.”

Read More

The Chicago Bears cannot afford another disaster on the offensive line. Sixty-eight sacks last season. Dead last in the NFL. Caleb Williams barely had a chance to breathe. If they want their No. 1 overall pick to succeed, fixing this line isn’t optional—it’s survival.Enter Kansas City Chiefs guard Trey Smith . At 25, he’s already one of the best guards in the league. He’s played over 1,200 snaps every season since being drafted in 2021. He doesn’t miss games. He doesn’t miss assignments. He doesn’t get bullied.The Bears reportedly plan to offer Smith a five-year, $105 million deal. That would make him one of the highest-paid guards in history. It’s a massive commitment, but if they don’t do it, someone else will.Kansas City wants to keep Trey Smith. But wanting and affording are two very different things. The Chiefs are sitting on just $3.2 million in cap space, while the Bears have $63 million to spend.According toNate Taylor, the Chiefs are unlikely to use the franchise tag on Smith.If Kansas City can’t work out a long-term deal before free agency, Smith is gone.And Chicago is ready to pounce.Trey Smith knows Darnell Wright. They played side by side at Tennessee for two years. That chemistry matters.Rebuilding an offensive line isn’t just about talent—it’s about trust. Smith and Wright have already been through it together. Putting them on the right side of the Bears’ line would give Williams something he didn’t have last year: protection.Alex Kay ofpointed out the potential impact of this pairing:The Bears aren’t just throwing money at a problem. They’re building a foundation.The Bears’ reported $105 million offer would be the new gold standard for guards. Right now, Atlanta Falcons’ Chris Lindstrom holds the record with a $102.5 million contract. Philadelphia Eagles’ Landon Dickerson sits at $84 million, with $21 million per year. If Chicago closes this deal, Smith becomes the highest-paid guard in NFL history.ESPN’s Matt Bowen ranked Smith as the No. 2 free agent in 2025, behind only Cincinnati Bengals wide receiver Tee Higgins.This isn’t just about Chicago. Once Smith signs, every team with a high-end guard will have to reconsider their price tags.
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs guard trey smith is set to hit the open market. The chicago bears plan to offer smith a five-year, $105 million deal. Smith and darnell wright played together at tennessee, and the bears could reunite them in 2025. If chicago closes this deal, smith becomes the highest-paid guard in nfl history.

Article Title: Will LeBron James play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (February 19, 2025)
Article Text:
Is LeBron James playing tonight? (Image via Jim Dedmon-Imagn Images)

LeBron James

Los Angeles Lakers

Is LeBron James playing tonight? Los Angeles Lakers injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets

Los Angeles Lakers injury report (Image via NBA)

’ status for the’ upcoming game against the Charlotte Hornets remains uncertain as he is listed as questionable due to a foot injury. The Lakers, holding a 32-20 record, are set to face the struggling Hornets (13-39) at Crypto.com Arena on Wednesday, February 19, at 10:00 PM ET. James’ potential absence could significantly impact the Lakers’ performance, as he continues to be a cornerstone of the team’s success. LeBron James , averaging 24.4 points, 7.4 rebounds, and 8.6 assists over the last 20 games, is not only the Los Angeles Lakers’ leading scorer but also their top rebounder and playmaker. His ability to dominate both ends of the floor has been crucial for Los Angeles, which ranks 14th in the league with 113.3 points per game. Without him, the team’s offensive rhythm and defensive presence could take a hit, especially against a Hornets squad that, despite their poor record, has shown resilience in certain areas.The Lakers’ injury report also includes Maxi Kleber, who is out with a foot injury. Kleber’s absence further depletes the team’s depth, putting additional pressure on role players like Austin Reaves and Rui Hachimura to step up. Reaves, averaging 20.2 points and 6.9 assists in the last 20 games, has been a reliable secondary option, but the Lakers’ chances of securing a win would undoubtedly be higher with LeBron James on the court.On the Hornets’ side, LaMelo Ball is listed as probable with an ankle injury, providing a glimmer of hope for Charlotte. Ball, averaging 27.3 points per game, is the Hornets’ leading scorer and a key facilitator. His presence could pose challenges for the Los Angeles Lakers’ defense, particularly if LeBron James is sidelined. However, the Hornets are dealing with their own injury woes, including season-ending absences for Grant Williams, Brandon Miller, and Tre Mann.The game will be broadcast on SportsNet LA and FDSSE, with live streaming available on Fubo. Fans can also engage with the action through FanDuel Fantasy, adding an extra layer of excitement to the matchup.Also read: Why are the Los Angeles Lakers and Charlotte Hornets playing today? Exploring the reason behind the NBA’s rescheduled February 19 game after the All-Star break As the Los Angeles Lakers aim to maintain their playoff positioning, all eyes will be on James’ status leading up to tip-off. His potential absence could shift the dynamics of the game, making this a must-watch contest for NBA enthusiasts.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers host the charlotte hornets on wednesday, february 19. Lebron james is listed as questionable due to a foot injury. The lakers are holding a 32-20 record, while the hornets are 13-39. The game will be broadcast on sportsnet la and fdsse with live streaming available on fubo.

Article Title: Carson Wentz: “I Wish I Could Trade Places with Foles”: Carson Wentz Admits He Wishes He Took Nick Foles’ Place in Eagles’ 2018 Super Bowl
Article Text:
Getty Images









Carson Wentz's Journey: From MVP Contender to Sideline Supporter

The Foles-Wentz Dynamic: A Tale of Two Quarterbacks

Reflecting on 'What Could Have Been'

In a candid reflection, Carson Wentz has expressed a heartfelt desire to have been the one leading the Philadelphia Eagles to their historic 2018 Super Bowl victory . In a recent interview, Wentz admitted, "I would love to trade places with Nick Foles and win that Super Bowl back in the day."During the 2017 NFL season, Carson Wentz was on an MVP trajectory, steering the Eagles to an impressive 11-2 record. However, a devastating ACL injury in Week 14 abruptly ended his season. This setback paved the way for backup quarterback Nick Foles to step in. Foles not only filled the void but led the team through the playoffs, culminating in a stunning 41-33 victory over the New England Patriots in Super Bowl LII.Wentz's absence during this pinnacle moment was emotionally challenging. Reports from 2022 suggest that he "voiced his displeasure with the Eagles' success" to fellow injured teammates during the Super Bowl run. This sentiment led to a confrontation, highlighting the internal struggle Wentz faced watching his team achieve glory without him.Despite the emotional turmoil, Carson Wentz has consistently maintained respect and camaraderie towards Foles. Their relationship, though tested by circumstances, remained professional. Foles, after leading the Eagles to their first Super Bowl win, handled his return to a backup role with grace, emphasizing the team's success over individual accolades.The 2018 season saw Carson Wentz's return to the field, but lingering injuries and the shadow of the previous season's success created a complex environment. Foles once again stepped in towards the season's end, leading the Eagles to the playoffs, though they fell short of another Super Bowl appearance.Carson Wentz's recent admission sheds light on the personal and professional challenges athletes face when sidelined during critical moments. His longing to have been the one to secure the championship for Philadelphia underscores the weight of expectations and the unpredictability of sports careers.As Carson Wentz continues his journey in the NFL, his reflections serve as a testament to resilience and the complex emotions inherent in professional sports.Also read - Jason Kelce Hints That Taylor Swift Is Changing Travis Kelce—"He Was Like Peter Pan" Before
Article Summary: Carson wentz has expressed a heartfelt desire to have been the one leading the philadelphia eagles to their historic 2018 super bowl victory. In a recent interview, wentz admitted, "i would love to trade places with nick foles and win that super bowl back in the day"

Article Title: Taylor Swift was a “loyal friend” to Blake Lively and now wants to stay away from Justin Baldoni drama days after Super Bowl
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Taylor Swift Does Not Want To Do Anything With The Drama Brewing Between Blake Lively And Justin Baldoni



Taylor Swift’s Fans Have Defended Her Even After She Got Trolled Heavily After Super Bowl



It has been a pretty tough time for Taylor Swift ever since she got booed at the Super Bowl 2025 when her boyfriend, Travis Kelce ’s team, the Kansas City Chiefs lost the trophy to the Philadelphia Eagles. To make matters worse for Taylor Swift, she has also gotten involved in the controversy between Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni even though she has not been sued but now there is a new twist to the story.A source to the billionaire pop star has revealed to Page Six that she wants to pull away from her friendship with Blake Lively because she is “hurt”. The source said, “Taylor wants nothing to do with this whole ordeal. She has always been a loyal friend to Blake and doesn’t appreciate being thrown into this at all.”This is also evident since the two have not been spotted in public since the controversy began in December. Many fans expected to spot Blake Lively and her husband Ryan Reynolds at the Super Bowl but unfortunately, neither of them was spotted with Taylor Swift.As per Page Six’s source, “Taylor is really hurt by this whole situation and feels like a pawn.”For the unversed, when Blake Lively accused her It Ends With Us co-star Justin Baldoni of sexual harassment, he filed a counter lawsuit against her and sued her and Ryan Reynolds for $400 million. Due to this, Justin Baldoni released some texts that were exchanged between Blake Lively and him when their blockbuster movie was being shot.In one of the texts that was released by Justin Baldoni, Blake Lively had referred to herself as “Khaleesi” and called Taylor Swift her “dragon”. This could be one of the strong reasons why Taylor Swift feels like a “pawn” as per Page Six.Taylor Swift’s loyal fanbase has not left her side as many people have slammed her and supported Justin Baldoni. Many of Taylor Swift’s fans have also slammed Blake Lively for intentionally involving her in a drama that had nothing to do with her.Recently, Blake Lively made her first public appearance on the red carpet of the SNL show amidst her legal drama with Justin Baldoni. This is in complete contrast to Taylor Swift’s situation who missed her close friend, Danielle Haim’s birthday party recently.Taylor Swift and her boyfriend, Travis Kelce have not been spotted since the two got heavily trolled at the Super Bowl 2025. After the game, Travis Kelce appeared heartbroken and rushed to catch up with Taylor Swift. Taylor's absence from the public eye has also worried her fans .Also Read: Dak Prescott’s fiancée Sarah Jane Ramos reveals their future plans including their daughter’s next adventure
Article Summary: Taylor swift wants to pull away from her friendship with blake lively because she is “hurt” the two have not been spotted in public since the controversy began in december. Taylor swift’s loyal fanbase has not left her side as many people have slammed her and supported justin baldoni.

Article Title: NBA Buyout Rumors: Golden State Warriors could potentially sign $4 million ex-NBA star to support Jimmy Butler and Stephen Curry and bolster the squad
Article Text:
Jimmy Butler in Golden State Warriors (Image via Youtube:Chazz NBA)

Golden State Warriors

“It's the defensive end where Beverley built his career though, having earned Defensive Player of the Year votes in five different NBA seasons and earning All-Defensive Team honors three times,”

The, fresh off a roster upgrade by acquiring Jimmy Butler on Feb. 5, now face a gap in their point guard depth after including Dennis Schroder in the multi-team deal. To address this, the Warriors are reportedly eyeing a defensive-minded free agent who could bring stability to their backcourt: Patrick Beverley .Beverley, a 12-year NBA veteran, recently became a free agent after mutually parting ways with Israeli team Hapoel Tel Aviv. Known for his tenacious defense, Beverley has built a reputation as one of the league’s most disruptive on-ball defenders.wrote Blue Man Hoop’s Peter O’Keefe While Patrick Beverley’s offensive contributions have been modest—averaging 6.2 points, 3.3 rebounds, and 2.9 assists last season with the Philadelphia 76ers and Milwaukee Bucks—his defensive prowess could make him a valuable addition to the Golden State Warriors. His ability to disrupt opposing guards and hold his own against bigger players has been a hallmark of his career. During his lone season with the Los Angeles Lakers in 2022, he averaged 6.4 points, 3.1 rebounds, and 0.9 steals per game.Patrick Beverley’s journey through the NBA includes stints with seven franchises, most notably the Houston Rockets , Los Angeles Clippers, and Minnesota Timberwolves. His physicality and relentless energy on defense have made him a fan favorite and a respected opponent.The Golden State Warriors would gain a seasoned point guard who may improve their bench defense if they signed Beverley, even though it wouldn't immediately propel them into the running for the championship. In the second half of the season, his expertise and ability to manage game tempo may prove invaluable.The Warriors are trying to bolster their squad, and Patrick Beverley's availability offers a fascinating chance. He might be the missing component to assist Golden State overcome the obstacles in its path because of his defensive mentality and seasoned leadership.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might want to bag EuroLeague Real Madrid rookie to support LeBron James' and Luka Doncic's Championship push Let us know in the comments below if you feel this could be a smart move from the Golden State Warriors. Should they sign the NBA veteran Patrick Beverley or should the Warriors be on the outlook for someone who synergizes with Stephen Curry , Jimmy Butler , and the rest of the squad, and can be a fitting replacement for Dennis Schroder?
Article Summary: Patrick beverley is a 12-year nba veteran who recently parted ways with hapoel tel aviv. The golden state warriors are reportedly interested in signing beverley. Beverley has earned all-defensive team honors three times in his career. The warriors are fresh off a roster upgrade by acquiring jimmy butler.

Article Title: Oilers' Evander Kane faced NHL investigation and suspension following serious allegations from ex-wife Anna Kane
Article Text:
Image via Image Group LA via Getty Images

Evander Kane Got Suspended And Had To Be Investigated By NHL Due To The Accusations Levied Against Him By His Ex Wife. Anna Kane



Evander Kane, the star player of the Edmonton Oilers, has been involved in a bitter divorce battle with his ex wife Anna Kane. But at one point in his life, his bitter separation from his ex wife also had a huge impact on his career. In 2021, Evander Kane reached a point in his career where he had to be investigated by the National Hockey League, causing a huge blow to the trust fans had in him.Three years ago, in 2021, Evander Kane’s ex wife Anna Kane filed for divorce and released a statement on social media. She accused him of financial negligence, domestic assault and betting on NHL games.These accusations sent shockwaves across the league and fans were disappointed in Evander Kane. However, the NHL did not take these allegations lightly and released a statement that highlighted the seriousness of the accusations and how they would be handling it.In its statement, the NHL said, “The League was made aware this evening of a post on social media alleging that San Jose Shark’s Evander Kane bet on NHL games. The integrity of our game is paramount and the League takes these allegations very seriously.”The statement then went on to speak about how the NHL would be conducting an investigation of its own to verify the betting allegations against Evander Kane.At that time, Evander Kane was playing for the San Jose Sharks and denied all allegations against him and released a statement on social media for it. San Jose Sharks made a statement where the team suspended Evander Kane from attending the Training Camp until the investigation was completed.A few weeks later, the NHL announced that it had completed its investigation against the betting allegations regarding Evander Kane and had found no evidence for it. The NHL said, it “found no evidence to support those allegations, or allegations that Mr. Kane made any effort to negatively impact his own Club’s games.”While Evander Kane was declared innocent, a few months later the San Jose Sharks terminated his contract for breaking COVID-19 protocols and that’s how he ended up joining the Edmonton Oilers.It has been a few years since then and now Evander Kane is engaged to another woman and is busy raising his children.Also Read: Connor McDavid’s wife Lauren Kyle’s latest post for Team Canada has fans talking ahead of the final against Team USA
Article Summary: Evander kane was involved in a bitter divorce battle with his ex wife anna kane. She accused him of financial negligence, domestic assault and betting on nhl games. San jose sharks terminated his contract for breaking covid-19 protocols and that's how he ended up joining the edmonton oilers.

Article Title: Sidney Crosby’s heartbreaking loss worries fans ahead of Team Canada’s final against Team USA as he grieves
Article Text:
Image via Gene J. Puskar/AP

Sidney Crosby Is Taking The Passing Of Mike Lange “Pretty Hard” And Fans Are Worried About Him



Sidney Crosby has shown his talent as he led Team Canada to win the match against Team Finland on Monday. Currently, the team is gearing up to face the Team USA in the 4 Nations Face Off. But there is something that fans are worried about and it is not related to his performance - it is about his emotional state of mind.Josh Yohe of The Athletic recently made a post on X about Sidney Crosby that has shocked fans, hours before the 4 Nations Face Off final match against Team USA. As per Josh Yohe’s post on X, he had a conversation with the captain of Team Canada and Sidney Crosby is taking the passing of Pittsburgh Penguins broadcaster Mike Lange “pretty hard”.Josh Yohe also added that the Pittsburgh Penguins broadcaster had a “special relationship” with Sidney Crosby and other stars of the team, so the loss must be very difficult to get through for them.Fans are heartbroken at the loss of Mike Lange and many are worried about Sidney Crosby’s emotional state. A fan wrote, “A very sad huge loss. One of the greatest Pittsburgh sports announcers. Making all Pens games comes alive. Wonderful and memorable slogans”.Another fan wrote, “One of my first thoughts was whether this would be weighing on Sid tomorrow during the game, and obviously it will be. Maybe he'll get his first four-goal game ever?”A third fan sympathised with the Pittsburgh Penguins’ players and wrote, “Never been to Pittsburgh. Life long Pens fan. I'm taking this hard. I can't imagine how hard for the people that knew him.”Many fans also believe that this might give “extra” motivation for Sidney Crosby to win the final against Team USA today. A fan echoing the same emotion wrote, “Terrible loss for their hockey community. Now extra motivation for Sid to go out and win tomorrow night, and honor his friend.”Mike Lange had a 46 year long career as a broadcaster for the Pittsburgh Penguins and had a huge fan following. Unfortunately, the legend passed away at 76 years of age at his home on 19th February.Also Read: Oilers' Evander Kane faced NHL investigation and suspension following serious allegations from ex-wife Anna Kane
Article Summary: Sidney crosby is taking the passing of pittsburgh penguins broadcaster mike lange “pretty hard” fans are worried about his emotional state of mind. Mike lange had a 46 year long career as a broadcaster for the pittsburgh penguins. Many believe that this might give “extra” motivation for sidney crosby to win the final against team usa.

Article Title: New York Mets News: Ex-MLB star Paul Lo Duca opens up about 'bad accident' in New York City
Article Text:
Getty Images

Ex-MLB star Paul Lo Duca shares details of his accident



"bad accident"

“I want to thank everyone for their thoughts and prayers. I was involved in a bad accident coming back home to New york from Oaklawn. I was not able to eat for the first couple weeks because of multiple fractures but I’m getting stronger! 💪🏻”

A beloved MLB career and life after baseball



Lo Duca's road to recovery



Former New York Mets catcher Paul Lo Duca recently revealed information about a serious accident he experienced on his way back to New York City from Oaklawn. He had multiple fractures, which made eating challenging for weeks. In spite of the injuries, Lo Duca informed fans that he is recovering and becoming stronger.Lo Duca posted on social media on February 19, 2025, to give his fans an update on his status. In a moving message, he appreciated all the prayers and well wishes, confirming that he had been involved in awhile coming back to New York. He revealed that his injuries were so bad that he could not eat at first, but he is hopeful for recovery.He wroteAlthough Lo Duca did not provide specific details regarding the cause or nature of the accident, his mention of multiple fractures indicates the seriousness of the situation. His post reassured fans that he was on the mend, signaling that he is out of immediate danger despite the difficult road to recovery.Paul Lo Duca is best known for his time in the New York Mets organization, specifically from his 2006 season. He hit .318 that year and played well to help his team win the NL East title. He was very good at managing a pitching staff and was a leader in the clubhouse, thus becoming an endearing figure to the fans.Following his departure from the Mets after the 2007 season, Lo Duca played for another year before retiring. He went on to become a successful horse racing analyst, working for the New York Racing Association and other media sources. His love of horse racing kept him in the public eye, although recent developments have seen him back in the spotlight for a negative reason.While the exact timeline for Lo Duca’s recovery remains uncertain, his positive outlook and resilience offer hope to his fans. His post suggests he is regaining strength, and the baseball community has rallied around him with messages of support.Though the accident was a setback, Lo Duca’s determined spirit—both as a player and now in recovery—continues to define him. Fans and former teammates alike will be watching closely as he works toward a full comeback from this unfortunate event.Also Read: New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone hints at potential DH role for non-roster invitee Dominic Smith
Article Summary: Former new york mets catcher paul lo duca recently revealed information about a serious accident he experienced on his way back to new york city from oaklawn. He had multiple fractures, which made eating challenging for weeks. His post reassured fans that he was on the mend, signaling that he is out of immediate danger despite the difficult road to recovery.

Article Title: IND vs BAN probable XI: Will India pick three spinners against Bangladesh?
Article Text:
Ravindra Jadeja (R) during a practice session ahead of India's opening match against Bangladesh in the ICC Champions Trophy. (ANI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Team India undergoes intense training in Dubai ahead of Champions Trophy | Exclusive Visuals

India begin Champions Trophy prep | Rishabh Pant struck on knee

India's probable XI vs Bangladesh:

Hot favourites India will begin their Champions Trophy campaign against Bangladesh in Group A on Thursday, and with just four teams in each group of the eight-team competition, every game matters in the quest to finish in the top two to qualify for the semifinals.Besides Bangladesh, India's other competitors in the group are hosts and defending champions Pakistan as well as New Zealand.India, who will play all their matches in Dubai, have the advantage of playing the entire tournament at just one venue and the players won't have to adjust to different pitches, unlike the other seven teams who will play across four venues -- Lahore, Karachi and Rawalpindi in Pakistan as well as Dubai.But the first match remains tricky. Despite knowing the historical nature of the Dubai track to have something in it for both batters and bowlers, India will have to take a call on whether to go in with three spinners or three pacers from their spin-heavy 15-member squad.India suffered a blow just before the tournament, with ace fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah ruled out because of a back injury. And with Mohammed Shami only recently returning to the team after a year-long injury layoff and Arshdeep Singh short on ODI experience, India coach Gautam Gambhir and captain Rohit Sharma have work to do in order to pick the bowling combination they want to go ahead with.India have as many as five spinners in the squad; namely Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakravarthy, and all-rounders Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel and Washington Sundar. While the pace-bowling unit has Harshit Rana and all-rounder Hardik Pandya besides Shami and Arshdeep.The dew expected late in the evening in Dubai is one factor that may prevent India from picking three spinners as it makes it difficult to grip the dewy ball. But with Axar being used at No. 5 against England and doing well, his inclusion can give India the balance they seek with a left-handed batting option in the mix in top five.However, the batting order looks sorted as the likes of Rohit, Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul pick themselves, unless the think-tank wants Rishabh Pant to do the wicketkeeping duties instead of Rahul, who did the job during the three-match ODI series against England just before the Champions Trophy.Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, KL Rahul (wk), Ravindra Jadeja, Mohammed Shami, Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh
Article Summary: India will begin their champions trophy campaign against bangladesh in group a on thursday. With just four teams in each group of the eight-team competition, every game matters. India will have to take a call on whether to go in with three spinners or three pacers from their spin-heavy 15-member squad.

Article Title: Milwaukee Bucks' Bobby Portis Hit With 25-Game Suspension After NBA's Anti-Drug Policy Violation
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

Bobby Portis Banned 25 Games Amid Milwaukee Bucks' Playoff Push



Impact on the Milwaukee Bucks



Despite the setback, Portis remains focused.



The Milwaukee Bucks just got hit with a major setback. Forward Bobby Portis has been suspended 25 games without pay after testing positive for Tramadol, a banned substance under the NBA/NBPA Anti-Drug Program. The announcement came Thursday, leaving the Bucks scrambling as they push for a strong playoff position. Portis, known for his high-energy play and physical presence, has been a key piece of Milwaukee’s rotation. His absence will force the team to adjust quickly, with just a handful of regular-season games left before the postseason. Bobby Portis expressed deep regret over the situation, taking full responsibility for his actions."I feel horrible and take full responsibility," he said. "I sincerely apologize to the Bucks organization, my teammates, coaches, family, and fans. I give everything I have on the court and will miss playing during this time."His agent, Mark Bartelstein, defended him, claiming the violation resulted from an unfortunate mix-up."Bobby unintentionally took Tramadol, thinking it was Toradol," Bartelstein explained. "Toradol is an approved pain medication he has used before. The Tramadol pill came from an assistant with a valid prescription, who mistakenly told Bobby it was Toradol. This was an honest mistake."Despite the explanation, the NBA enforced its strict anti-drug policy. Bucks GM Jon Horst acknowledged the difficult situation but stood by Portis.“This is tough for Bobby and the team,” Horst said. “He and the Bucks respect the NBA/NBPA Anti-Drug Program and will accept the decision. But we fully support Bobby—he’s an integral part of this team and our community.”The Milwaukee Bucks just got hit with a major setback. Forward Bobby Portis has been suspended 25 games without pay after testing positive for Tramadol, a banned substance under the NBA/NBPA Anti-Drug Program. The announcement came Thursday, leaving the Bucks scrambling as they push for a strong playoff position.With Portis averaging 13.7 points and 8.3 rebounds in 46 games this season, his absence will be felt. He’s been one of the best bench players in the league, finishing top three in Sixth Man of the Year voting the past two seasons. Without him, Milwaukee will have to dig deep to stay competitive.The Bucks still have an open roster spot, so they could bring in a temporary replacement. But Portis’ toughness and energy aren’t easy to replace.“I will work hard and be ready for our playoff run. Thank you for your support—I appreciate it more than you know.”Also Read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might want to bag EuroLeague Real Madrid rookie to support LeBron James' and Luka Doncic's Championship push Portis’ suspension is a tough blow for the Bucks, but with the playoffs approaching fast, Milwaukee has no time to dwell on it. The team will need to adapt, and Portis will have to stay ready for when he returns. The hope? That they’re still in a strong position when he does.
Article Summary: Bobby portis has been suspended 25 games without pay after testing positive for tramadol. The announcement came thursday, leaving the bucks scrambling as they push for a strong playoff position. His absence will force the team to adjust quickly, with just a handful of regular-season games left before the postseason.

Article Title: 5 reasons why you should play GTA Vice City in 2025
Article Text:
Image via Steam

1) Experience the Classic Open-World Magic

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City - Anniversary Trailer

2) A Good Storyline That Never Gets Old

3) The Ultimate 80s Nostalgia Trip

4) Enhanced Graphics on Modern Platforms

5) Prepare for GTA 6’s Return to Vice City

Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is a game that has stood the test of time. Originally released in 2002, this retro classic continues to capture the hearts of gamers worldwide. With the much-anticipated launch of GTA 6 set for 2025, there’s never been a better time to revisit Vice City. Whether you’re a longtime fan or a newcomer, here are five compelling reasons why playing GTA Vice City in 2025 is still worth your time.GTA Vice City set the foundation for modern open-world games. Its sun soaked streets, neon lit nightlife, and vibrant 1980s atmosphere create an immersive experience like no other. The game’s freedom to explore, interact with NPCs, and take on missions at your own pace was revolutionary at the time and remains enjoyable even today.Vice City follows Tommy Vercetti, a small time criminal who rises through the ranks to become a powerful underworld kingpin. Inspired by classic gangster films like Scarface, the game’s storyline is filled with betrayal, ambition, and action-packed missions that still hold up in 2025. The gripping narrative, combined with unforgettable characters, makes for an engaging experience.If you love the 80s, Vice City is a treat. The game’s soundtrack features legendary artists like Michael Jackson, A Flock of Seagulls, and Blondie, transporting players back in time. From its fashion styles to its neon-drenched cityscape, every detail of the game oozes retro charm. Cruising through Vice City with the radio blasting classic hits remains one of the most enjoyable aspects of the game.Thanks to the GTA Trilogy - The Definitive Edition, players can now experience Vice City with improved graphics, better lighting effects, and smoother gameplay. Available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, and even mobile devices, the remastered version keeps the game relevant in the modern era while retaining its nostalgic charm.With GTA 6 bringing players back to Vice City in a new universe, revisiting the original can serve as the perfect preparation. The upcoming game is expected to include Easter eggs and references to the 2002 classic, making it even more exciting for fans who are familiar with the original setting.As we wait for GTA 6, diving back into GTA Vice City is a fantastic way to relive a classic and experience one of Rockstar’s finest creations. Whether for nostalgia, excitement, or sheer fun, 2025 is the perfect time to revisit this legendary title.
Article Summary: Gta vice city set the foundation for modern open-world games. Inspired by classic gangster films like scarface, the game’s storyline is filled with betrayal, ambition, and action-packed missions that still hold up in 2025. Cruising through vice city with the radio blasting classic hits remains one of the most enjoyable aspects of the game.

Article Title: Finn Balor All WWE Championship Victories, List of Wrestlers the Demon King Slayed, Current Salary, and More
Article Text:
(Finn Balor at Monday Night RAW. Image Via Rich Freeda/WWE, Getty Images)

Finn Balor’s WWE achievements and victories

WWE Network: Finn Bálor vs. Kevin Owens - NXT Championship: The Beast in the East July 4, 2015

List of wrestlers the Demon King slayed inside the ring

Balor went on to win the NXT Championship in 2015 after defeating Kevin Owens .



. Baron Corbin was defeated by the Irish slayer in the SummerSlam 2018.



Andrade El Idolo was also defeated by Bálor to retain the Intercontinental Championship at Super ShowDown 2019.



To win the Intercontinental Championship at WrestleMania 35, Balor won against Bobby Lashley.



Fin Bálor also clinched the first-ever Universal Championship at SummerSlam 2016 defeating Seth Rollins.



Finn Bálor’s coolest matches: WWE Playlist

Finn Balor’s current salary and his future ahead

Finn Balor, popularly known as Fergal Devitt, is an Irish professional wrestler, who is WWE's most exciting and dynamic talent. He is endorsed by WWE and performs on the RAW brand as of 2024.Balor belongs to the faction “The Judgement Day” alongside his contemporaries Damian Priest, Rhea Ripley , and Dominik Mysterio. Recently, WWE fans got a glimpse of Bálor at the WWE Royal Rumble 2025 when he entered the Rumble match as entrant number #18.However, he was eliminated by John Cena after he teamed up with Fatu to attack Penta. Despite his elimination, he still stands tall as one of the finest wrestlers in the history of WWE.The Irish superstar has spent more than a decade in the ring to captivate wrestling fans worldwide with his technical mastery, high-flying ability, sheer strength, and agility. Let us learn more about the WWE Universal Champion and take a glimpse at the wrestler's journey so far in the ring. Finn Balor honed his craft in the notorious dojo system of Japan, before moving to the United States of America to join WWE under NXT. Following this, he went on to clinch the NXT championship and several other major championships.Before stepping onto the global stage of wrestling, Finn Balor took training under New Japan Pro Wrestling (NJPW), under the ring name Prince Devitt. He was also a pivotal force in capturing the IWGP Junior Heavyweight Championship three times in the junior heavyweight division.Balor joined the WWE in 2014, where he became a standout performer in NXT. His charisma and demonic character made him one of the biggest stars of WWE. He won the NXT Championship in 2015 by defeating Kevin Owens to become the longest-reigning NXT Champion for 292 days.He mainly came into prominence on the main roster in 2016, after becoming the first-ever WWE Universal Champion at SummerSlam by defeating Seth Rollins . Later, in 2021, Finn joined the faction The Judgement Day, where he was deemed a top-tier talent as he consistently went on to clinch titles under his name.Balor won the WWE Universal Championship once, the WWE Intercontinental Championship, and the NXT Championship twice. He clinched the WWE United States Championship once. He also went into becoming the fastest grappler in WWE history to come out on top for the world title in 27 days.Besides, the heavyweight wrestler also became the Grand Slam Champion on September 2, 2023, when he teamed up with Damian Priest and won the WWE Tag Team Championship.In well-known bouts, Finn Balor's "Demon King" character has defeated several prominent WWE performers in several championships over the years. The list includes names of prominent wrestlers like:As of 2024, Finn Balor has a net worth of around $3 million. The majority of his income comes from his wrestling, including his WWE salary and merchandise sales. The Irish Superstar is currently earning $1 million per year from WWE as of March 2024.In addition to his wrestling earnings, Balor has made some investments in real estate, contributing to his overall wealth. However, wrestling remains his primary source of income.The Irish WWE superstar is revered as a global legend as long as he rules the WWE globe. From the Japanese dojo circles to the WWE squared wrestling rings, his journey is a true tale of inspiration and striving for excellence.Also Read: Finn Balor: A Decade of Darkness and Glory - Career Highlights, and Achievements | WWE News - The Times of India With his elimination at the Royal Rumble 2025, the champion might not be seen in the upcoming WrestleMania 41 but as per reports, the Judgment Day leader is set for a singles push in late 2025.
Article Summary: Finn balor, popularly known as fergal devitt, is an irish professional wrestler, who is wwe's most exciting and dynamic talent. He is endorsed by wwe and performs on the raw brand as of 2024. Balor belongs to the faction “the judgement day” alongside his contemporaries damian priest, rhea ripley, and dominik mysterio.

Article Title: Will Jayson Tatum play tonight against the Philadelphia 76ers? Latest update on the Boston Celtics star's injury report (February 20, 2025)
Article Text:
Boston Celtics forward Jayson Tatum blows a kiss after hitting a 3-pointer against the San Antonio Spurs during the first half of an NBA basketball game, Wednesday, Feb. 12, 2025, in Boston. (AP Photo/Charles Krupa)

Boston Celtics

Jayson Tatum

Is Jayson Tatum playing tonight? Boston Celtics injury report for tonight’s game against the Philadelphia 76ers (February 20, 2025)

Celtics injury report Feb 20 (Image via NBA)

Jayson Tatum’s impact on the Boston Celtics squad

Theare gearing up for a crucial matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers on Thursday, February 20, at the Wells Fargo Center. While the Celtics have been dominant this season, sitting at 39-16, all eyes are on their star forward,, as the team navigates its injury report. Jayson Tatum , the Boston Celtics’ leading scorer and one of the NBA’s most dynamic players, is not listed on the injury report for Thursday’s game. This is a significant relief for Boston fans, as Tatum has been instrumental in the team’s success this season. Averaging 27 points per game, he ranks seventh in the league in scoring and has been a consistent force on both ends of the floor. Over the last 20 games, Tatum has posted impressive numbers, including 25.2 points, 7.6 rebounds, and 5.6 assists per game.The Celtics’ injury report features only one player: Xavier Tillman, who is out with a knee injury. Tillman’s absence is a blow to Boston’s depth, but the team remains in strong shape with Tatum, Jaylen Brown, and Kristaps Porzingis leading the charge.On the other side, the 76ers are dealing with a more extensive injury list. Key players like Tyrese Maxey and Kelly Oubre Jr. will need to step up in the absence of Jared McCain (out for the season with a meniscus injury), Eric Gordon (wrist), Kyle Lowry (hip), and Justin Edwards (ankle).Tatum’s availability is crucial for the Celtics as they look to maintain their momentum. His ability to stretch the floor with his three-point shooting—he averages 3.6 made threes per game, fifth-best in the NBA—adds a layer of versatility to Boston’s offense. Additionally, his leadership and clutch performances have been pivotal in close games.The Boston Celtics enter the game with a +499 scoring differential, the best in the league, and rank sixth in points per game (117.2). Their defense, allowing just 108.1 points per contest, is equally formidable. With Tatum healthy and in form, Boston remains a strong favorite against a struggling 76ers squad.Also read: Will Joel Embiid play tonight against the Boston Celtics? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (February 20, 2025) Fans can watch the action live on TNT, truTV, and MAX as the Celtics and 76ers get ready to play. There can be regional limits on Max for players who want to stream the game.With Tatum at the forefront, the Celtics are well-positioned to keep winning. His performance and health will be crucial as Boston looks to maintain its standing as one of the Eastern Conference's best teams.
Article Summary: Boston celtics forward jayson tatum is not listed on the injury report for thursday’s game against the philadelphia 76ers. Tatum has been instrumental in the celtics' success this season, averaging 27 points per game. The celtics enter the game with a +499 scoring differential, the best in the league.
